[[Category:Fan films]]

'''''Niënor Níniel''''' is a [[2012]] amateur Czech adaption of events from [[The Children of Húrin|The Children of Húrin.]] This short drama accompanied by an original musical composition tells the story of [[Túrin]], [[Nienor]] and the defeat of [[Glaurung]] from the perspective of Nienor.
